title: God Renews the Covenant with Jacob
summary: Genesis 35 records Jacobâ€™s return to Bethel, where God appears to him again and confirms his new name, Israel. Rachel dies giving birth to Benjamin. Isaac also dies and is buried by Jacob and Esau.

faq.question: What happened at Bethel?
faq.answer: God reaffirmed His covenant with Jacob and reminded him of his new name, Israel.

faq.question: Who died in this chapter?
faq.answer: Rachel dies giving birth to Benjamin, and Isaac dies later in the chapter.
